name: ethiopian-marketplace
description: Premium e-commerce marketplace for Ethiopian products targeting local, African, and global buyers

scripts.build: echo 'Building assets...' && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.minify-css: cleancss -o frontend/css/main.min.css frontend/css/main.css frontend/css/components.css frontend/css/responsive.css frontend/css/auth.css
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting code...' && php -l backend/classes/*.php && php -l backend/api/*.php
scripts.deploy: echo 'Deploying to production...' && npm run build && rsync -avz --exclude 'node_modules' --exclude '.git' . user@server:/var/www/html/
scripts.backup: echo 'Creating backup...' && mysqldump -u root -p ethiopian_marketplace > backups/db_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql

author: Ethiopian Marketplace Team
